formula: Observe that arcsin(tanh(x)) = int {0..x} 1/cosh(t) so the generating function for this sequence is cosh( int {0..x} 1/cosh(t) ). Note the similarity to the generating function for A000364: cosh( int {0..x} 1/cos(t) ) = 1+x^2/2!+5*x^4/4!+61*x^6/6!+... - Peter Bala, Aug 24 2011.
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 08 2015
